cab.content:
THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT).
SECRET.
C.P. 2443.
CABINET.
KEY INDUSTRIES BILL.
Memorandum by the Secretary of State for War.
(Previous Papers:- C.P. 2374 and 2416.)
The substitution of a 33 per cent and valorem tariff for a system of prohibition and licence seems to me to raise far-reaching issues which the Cabinet ought carefully to consider. I am convinced that the change of method will raise large questions of a political character and will revive controversy which ought not to have any relation to the difficulties with which we are now confronted.
(Intd.) W.S.C.
War Office.
11th January, 1921.
